definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: An optional gamma counting NaI well is also available.
sentences.chinese: 該計數器還有一個可選的伽瑪計數碘化鈉孔。

sentences.english: It consists of 25 ultrapure crystals of sodium iodide totalling around 250 kilograms in mass.
sentences.chinese: 它由25個總重約250千克超純的碘化鈉晶體組成。
